alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Northern Big Horn; Powder River; Southern Rosebud; Southern Wheatland; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 27 at 2:35AM MDT until March 27 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow tapering off this morning. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central, south central, and southeast Montana. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult with hazardous travel conditions impacting the Monday morning commute. The cold and wet conditions could be hazardous for young livestock.
info.instruction: Consider delaying travel until Monday afternoon. If travel is absolutely necessary this morning, drive with extreme caution and be prepared for sudden changes in visibility. Leave plenty of room between you and the motorist ahead of you, and allow extra time to reach your destination. Avoid sudden braking or acceleration, and be especially cautious on hills or when making turns. Make sure your car is winterized and in good working order.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Northern Big Horn; Powder River; Southern Rosebud; Southern Wheatland; Southwestern Yellowstone
